content.rendered:
Directed by Jay.k

Written by Shiirshak S. Anand. Chintan Gandhi. Jay Krishnan. Manu Warrier

Star Emraan Hashmi (Samuel ‘Sam’ Isaac). Nikita Dutta (Maahi Sood). Manav Kaul (Rabbi Markus). Imaaduddin Shah (Abraham Ezra (as Imaad Shah)). Darshana Banik (Norah). Anil George (Rabbi Benyamin). Gaurav Sharma (Inspector Riaz Ahmed). Denzil Smith (Father Gabriel). Yuri Suri (Yakub Ezra). Sushmita Sur (Joshina). Jairoop Jeevan (Norah’s Father). Alka (Norah’s Mother). Bijay Anand (Sanjay). Tareeq Ahmed Khan (Bilal – Antique Dealer). Resh Lamba (Masud – Bilal’s Assistant). Alefia Kapadia (Darshana Sanghvi). Gargi Roy (Maahi’s Mother). Suresh K. Rajpal (Language Professor). Ivan Rodrigues (Milind Sanghvi). Aaryan Menghji (Young Sam (as Aryan Meghji)). Robbey Mrinal Ghoorahoo (Cedric). Simmran Sharma (Gynecologist (as Simran Sharma)). Pradeep Kumar (Jewish Priest). Aayush Shokeen (Jewish Guy 1). Anoop Singh Bisht (Jewish Guy 2). Aditya Narayan Chopra (Jewish Guy 3). Bhupendra Panwar (Jewish Guy 4). Nerrav Singh (Jewish Guy 5). Tirth Joisher (Jewish Kid 1). Paavit Khanija (Jewish Kid 2). Dharam Sharma (Policeman 1). Ritesh Mohabir (Policeman 2). Nikhil Bundhoo (Policeman 3). Mazhar Khan (Policeman 4). Rakeshq Bones (Policeman 5). Seeboruth (Policeman 6). Sandhyaaucharaz (Worker At Shop 1). Sabina Duviviez (Worker At Shop 2). Cerf Daworaz (Worker At Shop 3). Roshan Sharma (Forensic Department). Bundhoo (Forensic Department). Bungoraz (Forensic Department). Kishore Khimia (Forensic Department). Rajeshwar (Businessperson In Hotel). Deven (Businessperson In Hotel). Choytun (Businessperson In Hotel). Leena Olivia (Businessperson In Hotel). Amrit Budlorun (Businessperson In Hotel). Soovita Nowonjee (Businessperson In Hotel). Sachin Junye (Businessperson In Hotel). Anusha Junye (Businessperson In Hotel). Vikash Gungaram (Businessperson In Hotel). Asha Gungarama (Businessperson In Hotel). Poonam Tarun (Businessperson In Hotel). Shivam Tarun (Businessperson In Hotel). Shruti Tarun (Businessperson In Hotel). Vinod Tarun (Businessperson In Hotel). Addish Tatoree (Businessperson In Hotel). Renu Tatoree (Businessperson In Hotel). Vishal Tatoree (Businessperson In Hotel)

Language Hindi

Producers Vicky Bhatia. Sanjay Inamdar. Bhushan Kumar. Bhushan Kumar. Krishan Kumar. Krishan Kumar Kumar. Vivek Padaliya. Abhishek Pathak. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Vignesh Shetty. Pragya Singh

Production Panorama Studios. T-Series Films. T-Series and Panorama Studios
